text: Damir Ksyainovich Tregulov (; born 7 November 1998) is a Russian football player. He plays for FC Metallurg Vidnoye. ==Club career== He was raised in the FC Torpedo Moscow academy, with which he won the Moscow Cup (scoring 2 goals in the final) and Russian Cup for the born-in-1998 team. He made his debut in the Russian Professional Football League for FC Solyaris Moscow on 2 September 2016 in a game against FC Pskov-747 at the age of 17. He won zone Center of the Russian Professional Football League with FC Torpedo Moscow in the 2018–19 season. He made his Russian Football National League debut for FC Tekstilshchik Ivanovo on 28 July 2019 in a game against FC Tom Tomsk at the age of 20. ==References== ==External links== * * * Profile by Russian Professional Football League Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:Russian footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Association football midfielders Category:FC Solyaris Moscow players Category:FC Torpedo Moscow players Category:FC Tekstilshchik Ivanovo players
title: Damir Tregulov
